file_content.text: Two wires again, Yuun. Should I cut the blue one?
Hmm. Yes. The same maker's hand is clear in this work. The blue wire should be cut.
Two down, one to go.
Got it. [Cut the blue wire]
I think I should try the other wi--
Negative. [Cut the red wire]
Captain! Treacherous Imperial machine--you will not escape justice!
Captain! Steady now, let me help you.
Woah! Steady there, Captain--you're okay.
Hey, Captain, I don't like the freak any more than you do, but I think you'd better do whatever he's telling you to.
Gand is very sorry. Miscommunication has resulted in injury. Gand will make every attempt to be clearer in the future.
This is how Havoc Squad conducts turret maintenance.
Enough! [Shoot the panel]
Captain! Are you injured--can you hear me, sir?
Don't worry, Dorne, I'll make it.
I'm fine.
You'd better look me over and make sure.
[Flirt] I'm not sure.
Sir, I was only trying to help.
Hmph. As fit as ever, apparently.
I've had worse, believe me.
It's nothing I can't handle.
If you say so.
Ugh. That... didn't go how I'd planned.
That hurt.
Take these--they should reduce the pain.
Ah! That looked bad, Captain--you still with us?
I'll make it, Jorgan, don't worry.
I'm fine.
It's nice to know you care, Jorgan.
[Flirt] Worried about me?
Gotta keep my CO in one piece, right?
Don't get your hopes up.
I'm still kicking, Jorgan. Don't go filing for a promotion yet.
Hoping for a new job opening?
Nobody would've believed that you actually blew yourself up anyway.
That... wasn't part of the plan.
That hurt.
There was a plan?
Gand's shame is depthless. Clearly, Gand did not explain the process to disable this turret adequately.
In the future, Gand will attempt to ensure that no further miscommunication occurs. Deepest apologies, sir.
I still don't buy your mystical gibber--
No way. [Cut the red wire]
Again! Don't worry, Captain--the Imperial scum responsible will pay! I'll find and crush them, no matter how long it takes!
Sir! Sir, please--I really think it's best to listen to Sergeant Yuun's advice.
Ouch. This just isn't your day, Captain.
Wow. I wish I spoke bug--that freak must think this is hilarious.
Yuun does not know what to say, with shame so great. Yuun will try yet harder to be understood clearly with the final turret, please be assured.
It worked before, it'll work again.
Enough! [Shoot the panel]
What? You don't me--
Are you insa--
Please hold a mo--
Sir, Yuun apologizes deeply! This was not at all what Yuun intended!
Please, Captain--only sever the wires of the final turret, rather than shooting them. Yuun will stand by.
Ouch. Nice one, Captain.
Captain! Please, Captain--allow me to absorb such damaging impacts in the future. I am well suited to the task!
Why don't I handle this one, Captain? Stand clear!
Intriguing. Yuun had not considered this approach.
Our goal is almost in reach--the end of this journey, and the bridge to the next. Yuun will stand by.
Allow me, sir! For the Republic!
Our goal is almost in reach--the end of this journey, and the bridge to the next. Yuun will stand by.
